Package com.compactcode.strategy

Interface Summary
TransformationStrategy Represents a strategy used to transform/map a FluentList.
 

Class Summary
ImmediateTransformationStrategy A transformation strategy that delegates to Iterables.transform(Iterable, Function) and copies the result into a new list.
LazyTransformationStrategy A transformation strategy that delegates to Lists.transform(List, Function)
ParallelTransformationStrategy A transformation strategy that uses a ThreadPoolExecutor to transform items in parallel using a given number of threads.
